title: Black_Trump
author: Black_Trump
content: Hey guys am a newbie here, and I was ways to make or earn funds via online, and then an old friend told me about Bitcoin forum. And I've also come to know that this forum can give me the best possible knowledge that I need about cryptocurrency, whilst learning about the different currencies in crypto I can as well earn from it.What are possible ways to earn from the platform and whats involved  not forgetting how I can make progress in my journey in the crypto world . Help is needed

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: If a friend told you about the forum, why not ask your friend for more details? You came here. Did you go through the forum sections in order to read some topics? You should start with the section in which you are located. There are plenty of answers to the question that concerns you; after reading further and realizing that you are not alone in the desire to learn something more, you may have more specific questions than today’s topic. I am in no way attacking you, but in order to achieve something, you must understand that no one here will show you the “money” button. Everything needs to be read and studied on your own. The answer to your question today contains all the information on the forum.Join us.

comments.author: Dzwaafu11
comments.body: Quote from: Black_Trump on September 09, 2023, 05:45:31 AMHey guys am a newbie here, and I was ways to make or earn funds via online, and then an old friend told me about Bitcoin forum. And I've also come to know that this forum can give me the best possible knowledge that I need about cryptocurrency, whilst learning about the different currencies in crypto I can as well earn from it.What are possible ways to earn from the platform and whats involved  not forgetting how I can make progress in my journey in the crypto world . Help is neededYou are welcome to the bitcointalk forum. You are already in a safe place. You can learn as much as you want on the forum. Follow the forum rules and regulations. Don't hesitate to ask questions. If you don’t understand something, bring it up here. People will help you through it, and you will succeed. However, you said your friend told you about this forum, which means he told you you would earn money here, which is true, but as a newbie, forget about that. If you put that in your mind, then definitely it will be very hard for you to learn and progress here.   To read the forum rules and regulations guiding us Newbies read before postingNOTE Don’t plagiarise here; that is what affected some newbies, and they got their account banned at the end of the day. Don’t copy and paste someone's content or copy something online and claim it as your own. Don’t use AI to post here; it is also against the forum rules. While operating on the forum, I wish you the best of luck.You can also use Beginners and help Encyclopedia

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Welcome to Bitcointalk, while it is true that you can earn while learning and contributing to discussions here in the forum you shouldn’t take the forum as a job, instead look at it as a means to earn side cash because you never can tell what will happen to the forum tomorrow so don’t rely entirely on the forum, after it’s not a money making machine so don’t depend entirely on it. Aside from that if you plan to stay here and do well you might as well want to check out the rules of the forum, because you definitely will face issues if you just want to be making use of the forum without actually going through the rules that have been laid down to help guide newbies, click here to check it out.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: First, if you want to learn how to earn from this forum, I will advise you as a beginner to focus on learning things about the forum first, then you can discover means of earning from the forum yourself. The forum is broad, and it's really going to be helpful to you if you are the type that reads a lot. You will develop yourself faster than you imagine, and then you can earn from the forum with the knowledge that you have. In the aspect of signature earnings, which is one of the most popular and common means of earning from the forum, you will have to give the forum a little of your time in order to gain those activities and merits that could prepare you to attain the rank that will help you qualify for a signature campaign. Aside from why you are learning about crypto, you can also advertise your personal skills that you have gained outside of this forum. There might be people here who are interested in what you do and might hire you for a job for which, at the end, you will earn money for executing that job.

comments.author: Upgrade00

comments.author: dzungmobile
comments.body: Quote from: Black_Trump on September 09, 2023, 05:45:31 AMan old friend told me about Bitcoin forum. Why you don't ask your friend first?QuoteAnd I've also come to know that this forum can give me the best possible knowledge that I need about cryptocurrency, whilst learning about the different currencies in crypto I can as well earn from it.Welcome message. Let me welcome you with the message from theymos, the head admin.I quote some important part of the message.Quote from: theymos on September 23, 2018, 08:58:25 PMWelcome to bitcointalk.org, the Bitcoin Forum! You can access this welcome message from the "help" link in the top menu bar at any time.As a member of the forum, you are surrounded by legends; phenomenal successes and catastrophic failures. The forum was created by Satoshi Nakamoto and saw the first exchange, the first altcoin, and the first ICO, but also catastrophic software flaws, massive thefts, and incredible scams. You too have an opportunity to become part of the forum's history: whether and in what way you do so is up to you....This forum exists to provide a platform for the free (but ordered) exchange of ideas. If you have an idea to express, then it is probably possible to do it here as long as you follow the rules.A lot of people come here primarily looking to make money. The forum administration is very happy that people are able to use the forum in order to better themselves; indeed, one of the reasons for Bitcoin's creation was to break the artificial barriers which prevent so many people around the world from attaining prosperity. However, if your attempts to make money conflict with the forum's primary goal of enabling discussion, then you are swimming upstream, and you will not be sucessful in the end.If you view the forum as some sort of "job" where you complete some basic tasks and get paid, then you will almost certainly be disappointed, and the forum administration will not be sympathetic. If you do make money using the forum, then it will be through innovation and entrepreneurship, not any sort of mindless busywork.QuoteWhat are possible ways to earn from the platform and whats involved  not forgetting how I can make progress in my journey in the crypto world .Forum is not an ATM, you must be a good member to join signature campaigns to earn.Other ways is learning about blockchain, designs, whatever can help you to get jobs and get payment in bitcoin or cryptocurrency.Cryptocurrency job listQuoteHelp is neededSearching by yourself helps you most and best. Because you can find answers whenever you are ready to search.[Guide] Searching effectively

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: I think your post is not going to be very popular, because in theory the money that many of us earn with signature campaigns should be an extra that people who enjoy exchanging opinions in forums like this one get, and not the main objective. Although the reality is that we know that there are many people who come to the forum basically attracted by the money and there are many who have been here for years like this. Think that even if you make a good contribution to the forum it can take you a year to start making money here (if you are very good it will be less time), so I would take it as a long term thing where you worry about learning about bitcoin and cryptocurrencies and other areas, such as economics, and entertain yourself exchanging opinions.

comments.body: You should ask your friends first so you don't have to ask directly on this forum. He knows how and what needs to be done.You can learn from him because if you ask directly in this forum, you may have to wait patiently to get the answer you want. Meanwhile, you can read what you need from this forum and increase your knowledge about crypto.You can also visit your local language thread to get to know people from the same country as you. That will be better because you can know what they have done and how you can be like them.

comments.author: Cyber_Alien
comments.body: Welcome to the Bitcointalk forum. The spot to learn more about Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies in general is right here. You can find a wealth of information about bitcoin, the most recent cryptocurrency news, and more in this forum.  You just need to be willing to learn because there are many individuals in this community who can teach you things. You also need to adhere to the site's rules and regulations. Nothing should be copied or pasted that belongs to someone else. Be yourself and convey how you perceive the idea of a certain subject.You can take part in a signature campaign and earn money, and you can also give back to the neighborhood by proposing a topic for discussion.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Store your passwords correctlyIvan Bianco, a blockchain gaming-focused YouTuber based in Brazil who runs the channel Fraternidade Crypto, apparently had nearly $60,000 worth of cryptocurrency and a stash of NFTs stolen this week after accidentally revealing his crypto wallets' seed phrases during a livestream.During the stream, Bianco opened a document that revealed his seed phrases, a move that allowed unknown individuals to take control of his wallets and allegedly steal his funds. Fraternidade Crypto has approximately 34,000 subscribers on YouTube and over 2.2 million views across all videos since 2017.https://decrypt.co/154522/youtuber-loses-60k-worth-crypto-after-showing-seed-phrase-stream
